biography: Kunihiko Ikuhara (幾原 邦彦 Ikuhara Kunihiko, born December 21, 1964), also known as Ikuni, is a Japanese creative artist who has collaborated on several famous anime and manga series. He is best known for his early work on Sailor Moon and Revolutionary Girl Utena, and for his later work on Mawaru Penguindrum, Yurikuma Arashi, and Sarazanmai.
name: Kunihiko Ikuhara
